column4: hey guys i have a 16 gb ssd and it has xp preinstalled. i wanted to install ubuntu so i freed up 7.7 gb what partitions do i have ot make ?
/, /swap (if you want to use swap on ssd), and a separate /home is always nice
Geek `N`Proud, CLI is user-friendly, it's just picky about who its friends are :)
yes that is what i did now i have 5.1 gb / .... 2 gb /home ... and 525 mb swap does that sound right? and both my / and /home are EXT3
